XRTransientInputHitTestSource.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRTransientInputHitTestSource interface of the WebXR Device API handles transient input hit test subscriptions. You can get an XRTransientInputHitTestSource object by calling the .

remarks.para: This object doesn't itself contain transient input hit test results, but it is used to compute hit tests for each by calling , which returns objects.

XRTransientInputHitTestSourceCancel.summary: NOTE Experimental The cancel() method of the interface unsubscribes a transient input hit test.
